resetBlacklist.message: Are you sure you want to delete the blacklist (this cannot be undone)?

addUrl.message: Enter the url or domain name (or comma separated list) to blacklist.

removeUrl.message: Enter the url or domain name (or comma separated list) to remove from the blacklist.

changeBlacklistTypeNone.message: Choosing 'none' for encryption type means that anyone who can open this page can see your blacklist in plain text (not recommended). This action will clear your blacklist entirely; are you sure you want your blacklist to be unencrypted?

changeBlacklistTypeSHA1.message: This action will encrypt your blacklist entirely; are you sure you want your blacklist to be encrypted using SHA1 (this cannot be undone)?

changeMatchingToDomain.message: This action will clear your blacklist entirely; are you sure you want your blacklist to be matched on domains?

changeMatchingToSubdomain.message: This action will clear your blacklist entirely; are you sure you want your blacklist to be matched on subdomains?

changeMatchingToURL.message: This action will clear your blacklist entirely; are you sure you want your blacklist to be matched on URLs?

importBlacklist.message: Enter a comma-separated list of hashes to import.
